atoa.roomates.activities

Class ApartmentStatusActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • atoa.roomates.activities.ApartmentStatusActivity

  • public class ApartmentStatusActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    class to represent the apartment status screen shows the user the apartment bills status and a pie chart which shows the amount payed by each user
